roleset.name: complain slightly
roleset.note: GROUSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'grouse' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from grouse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: nicely inverted
example.text: Groused *trace*-1 Robert Antolini, head of over-the-counter trading at Donaldson, Lufkin& Jenrette: [``It's making it tough for traders to make money.'']-1
example.arg: Robert Antolini, head of over-the-counter trading at Donaldson, Lufkin& Jenrette
